name: Monster Fantasy Ride
description:
Help the little alien find the way back to his planet!

Gameplay very simple, just tap and tap, he can jump, change the gravity, flip to bottom and top defend on the level.

You can create many levels as you want, let’s your creative go further!

Very Fun! Game for everybody!

Feature:
+ Nice sound and graphics
+ Simple gameplay, just tap and tap
+ Addictive gameplay
